hero.subtitle: Cuizly uses AI to recommend restaurants that match your tastes, budget and cravings.

mission.title: Mission
mission.subtitle: Connecting food lovers to the finest culinary experiences in Montreal
mission.description: Cuizly revolutionizes gastronomic discovery by using artificial intelligence to recommend restaurants perfectly suited to consumer preferences, budget, and cravings.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Discover all the features that make Cuizly the reference platform for culinary offers in Montreal.

ai_recommendations.description: Personalized recommendations based on your tastes and culinary preferences.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: No more endless searches: our AI guides you to the best addresses in Montreal, simple, personalized and according to your culinary preferences.

step1.title: Join Cuizly today
step1.description: Registration is quick and free: indicate your culinary preferences, and our AI will instantly suggest the best addresses in Montreal.

step2.title: Locate. Discover. Enjoy.
step2.description: Discover the best culinary addresses in Montreal around you in real time.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? A suggestion? Feel free to reach out

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Cuizly Technologies ("we", "our" or "Cuizly") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy informs you about how we collect, use and protect your information when you use our service.

sharing.title: 4. Information sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell, trade or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information in the following cases:
items: To protect our rights and security

rights.title: 5. Your rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete or limit the use of your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at cuizlycanada@gmail.com.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy, contact us at:
contact.address: Address: 2900 Bd Ã‰douard-Montpetit, Montreal, QC H3T 1J4

editor.address: Head Office: 2900 Bd Ã‰douard-Montpetit, Montreal, QC H3T 1J4

director.title: Publication Director
director.name: Iker Kiomba Landu, Chief Executive Officer

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: This entire site is subject to Canadian and international copyright and intellectual property legislation. All reproduction rights are reserved, including for downloadable documents and iconographic and photographic representations.

personal.title: Personal Data
personal.content: In accordance with Canadian privacy law, you have the right to access, correct and delete data concerning you. To exercise this right, contact us at cuizlycanada@gmail.com

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: Cuizly Technologies cannot be held responsible for direct and indirect damages caused to the user's equipment when accessing the site, resulting either from the use of equipment that does not meet the specified requirements, or from the appearance of a bug or incompatibility.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: Any dispute in relation to the use of the Cuizly site is subject to Canadian and Quebec law. Exclusive jurisdiction is attributed to the competent courts of Montreal.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Cuizly, you agree to be bound by these terms of service and all applicable laws and regulations.

service.title: 2. Service description
service.content: Cuizly is a platform that connects consumers to restaurants in Montreal by offering personalized culinary offers through artificial intelligence.

responsibilities.title: 3. User responsibilities
items: Maintain the security of your account
Use the service in a legal and respectful manner
Do not disrupt the functioning of the platform

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All content of Cuizly, including texts, graphics, logos and software, is the property of Cuizly Technologies and is protected by intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of liability
liability.content: Cuizly cannot be held responsible for indirect, incidental or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our service.

modifications.title: 6. Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms of service at any time. Changes will take effect immediately after posting on this page.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these terms of service, contact us at:
contact.address: Address: 2900 Bd Ã‰douard-Montpetit, Montreal, QC H3T 1J4

what.title: What is a cookie?
what.content: A cookie is a small text file placed on your computer when you visit a website. It allows your browser to be recognized and retains certain information about your preferences or past actions.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.content: These cookies are necessary for the site to function. They allow you to navigate the site and use its essential features such as authentication and security.

performance.title: Performance cookies
performance.content: These cookies collect information about how you use our site, such as the most visited pages. This data helps us improve the site's operation.

functionality.title: Functionality cookies
functionality.content: These cookies allow the site to remember your choices (such as your username or language) and provide enhanced and more personalized features.

management.title: Cookie management
management.content1: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer and you can configure most browsers to prevent their placement.
management.content2: However, if you do this, you may need to manually adjust certain preferences each time you visit a site and some services and features may not work.

disable.title: How to disable cookies
disable.chrome: Chrome: Settings â†’ Privacy and security â†’ Cookies and other site data
disable.firefox: Firefox: Options â†’ Privacy & Security â†’ Cookies and Site Data
disable.safari: Safari: Preferences â†’ Privacy â†’ Manage Website Data
disable.edge: Edge: Settings â†’ Cookies and site permissions â†’ Manage and delete cookies

third.title: Third-party cookies
third.content: Some cookies may be placed by third-party services we use, such as Google Analytics to measure site audience. These third-party services have their own privacy policies.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
